slides.action: Key Speech | Unlocking the Blockchain for everyone

paragraphs: UBlockchain Global Summit 2021 will launch on November 29th in Ulaanbaatar under the theme ‘Blockchain and Beyond’. Leading blockchain companies and executives will demonstrate the transformative power of Blockchain technology. The annual event is initiated by the Mongolian Fintech and Blockchain Council and is to be held next year in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

The summit covers a wide range of issues concerning blockchain development, updates on regulations and practices, implementation-focused experiences from experts across the industry, and a new perception of cryptocurrency risk management and attracts a large number of people from the country’s decision-making bodies.

This year, the Summit is aiming to explore and discuss the ways and solutions to adapt to changing environment of the crypto economy and overcome potential social, economic prospects, and legal risks in Mongolia, together with professional industry representatives. Its main agenda will revolve around Informative and extensive discussions on various topics regarding blockchain and cryptocurrencies, Speeches featuring leaders and key players from the field, Clarifications on where the Crypto Nation is headed, and how it will affect your daily life.
Industry-leading speakers will discuss digital currencies, crypto, and Blockchain technology. Visionary, frontline opinion delivered live and on-demand.

speakers.name: Gantig Bayarmagnai
speakers.description: CEO of IHC and Chairman of Fintech and Blockchain Council of Mongolia

speakers.name: Robert Palmer
speakers.description: Head of Loyalty and Rewards Wondr Gaming

speakers.name: Adam S. Tracy
speakers.description: Attorney Consultant in Crypto and Blockchain Policy

speakers.name: Khangal Nergui
speakers.description: Founder and CEO of Store Pay

speakers.name: Louis Curran
speakers.description: Strategic Advisor and Partner of JST Capital
